hi guys Laura Vitale and on this episode

long ago and I was so excited to get
kind of like get playing at home and
kind of get those same flavors in my own

how you doing can you create some claims
where do you have claims and if he does

now what I do to clean my claim that

scrub them with a little scrubber like

they're clean and good to go so let's
